title: T206 HOF and Old Mills FS

posts.post_title: T206 HOF and Old Mills FS
posts.post_content:
Some T206s for sale. Please add $3 for shipping no matter how many you take. Paypal FF please to [url]vettejayk@aol.com[/url] (can send emails to the same address).

- Ed Cicotte - FR-GD - $60
- Hal Chase pink - FR-GD - $42 (some light wrinkles not visible in scan)
- Mike Donlin fielding (scarcity 26) - GD - $32
- Hugh Duffy - FR-GD - $50
- Willie Keeler batting - GD - $82
- Frank Smith Chicago & Boston (scarcity 16) - GD - $70
- Vic Willis throwing - GD-VG - SOLD
- Ed Reagan SL - FR-GD - $55
- Patsy Dougherty arm in air Old Mill - FR - SOLD
- Gabby Street fielding Old Mill - GD - pending
- Jake Stahl glove Old Mill - GD - SOLD
